pages.text: The difficulty meter appears occasionally in the bottom left of your screen.  You can also set a keybind to toggle it within your control options. Your difficulty meter rises VERY slowly as you play.$(br2)  Don't let this worry you... the scaling speed has been reduced greatly for this pack.  As the meter grows, the mobs that spawn in the world will gain stat increases.

With the bountiful assortment of weapons, magic spells, and armor in this pack, this should not pose much of a hinderance if you prepare yourself. It takes quite a while before you will even notice a difference in the mobs.$(br2)  You can choose to let your meter slowly fill, increase it, or reduce it.  This is done with Enchanted and Cursed Hearts.  These will be covered in the next entries.
